subject: Add multi-page support, reader mode, freeform text with markdown
body:
- Multi-page state management: pages array in useAdState with
  add/duplicate/delete/reorder/switch. Active page data at top-level
  so all existing components work unchanged.
- PageStrip component: horizontal strip with page thumbnails,
  content indicators, and page management controls.
- Reader mode: clean full-screen view with arrow key navigation,
  Previous/Next buttons, dot indicators, and Escape to exit.
- Freeform text mode: Structured/Freeform toggle on Content tab.
  Freeform provides per-cell text editors with independent content,
  color, size, alignment. Optional markdown toggle per cell using
  marked library.
- Multi-page export: "Download All Pages (ZIP)" exports numbered
  PNGs for each page.
